pairwise

public void pairwise(java.lang.String attribute)
Executes a pair scoring method, utilizing the matchAttribute. This attribute is expected to return 2 to n results from the given query. This "pair" will then be utilized as a matching scheme to construct a sub dataset. This dataset can be scored and stored as a match

Parameters:
attribute - an attribute to perform the matching query

regex

private void regex(java.lang.String regex)
Executes a regex scoring method

Parameters:
regex - string containing regular expression

public void exactMatch(java.lang.String attribute)
Executes an exact matching algorithm for author disambiguation

Parameters:
attribute - an attribute to perform the exact match
